level.heading: Mandatory indemnification.
level.text: A corporation shall indemnify a director who was wholly successful, on the merits or otherwise, in the defense of any proceeding to which the director was a party because he or she was a director of the corporation against expenses incurred by the director in connection with the proceeding.

level.heading: Section References
level.text: This section is referenced in § 29-306.53, § 29-306.54, and § 29-306.56.
